result.translation: Èmi (Allāhu) ń fi ìlú yìí[1] búra.
result.footnotes: 1. Allāhu lè fi ohunkóhun búra, àmọ́ fífi Allāhu nìkan ṣoṣo búra ni ẹ̀sìn gbà àwa láyè mọ láti fi búra. Bíbá Allāhu wá akẹgbẹ́ (ẹbọ ṣíṣe) sì ni fífi n̄ǹkan mìíràn búra lẹ́yìn Allāhu - subhānahu wa ta‘ālā -.
